string-array.name: answer3
string-array.item: The teacher noticed and you got a bad grade.
You tried to copy it from your neighbour, but he did fail, so you did too.
It didn\'t work.
Your neighbor even helps you to answer his question and it works.
You have a nice time, but you completely ignored all of your friends.
She refused.
They did what you asked them to do.
You hired a ghostwriter, but it was expensive.
You calmed down, therefore it was easier for you to concentrate and you got a better grade.
You did nothing.
You got a lot of money, but a classmate noticed and now you are in big trouble.
He easily extinguish it.
You neighbor took yes, so did you, but it was wrong.
It was fun and you learned at least a little bit.
They talked about a classmate and you listened on their conversation awkwardly.
The teacher got even angrier.
You accepted their invite and had great fun.
Your friends got even more annoyed, but they asked you again.
You enjoyed the time with them.
You drink something cold, but now it feels even hotter, because your body needed to heat up to compensate the cold drink.
You went to the beach every day, but unfortunately it wasn\'t free, but at least you had a good time.
It was really boring and your friends laughed at you, when you told them that you were working here. But at least you got a lot of money.
You went to almost every sight and enjoyed it.
